title: How to prove that $|f(x)-f(y) | \geq k|x-y|$ (matrices, multivariable calculus, inequality, inverse function theorem, math) - Quora

response.answer_text: Can you explain it better? Start by writing the equation in a manner that we can understand it. See this link to learn how to write equations on Quora. There is some condition on x and y? Are they scalars? Vectors? Matrices? Real or complex? With the given information is quite impossible to answer the question!
